UISlider Class Reference

A simple slider class that uses SDL TTF text and NGL triangle planes. More...

#include <UISlider.h>

Collaboration diagram for UISlider:
[legend]

Detailed Description

A simple slider class that uses SDL TTF text and NGL triangle planes.

Author:
Will Herbert
Version:
1.0
Date:
Last revision 10/05/2015 Updated to comply with doxygen and NCCA coding standard

Definition at line 24 of file UISlider.h.

[in] _fontSize the size of the text, cannot be changed after contruction
[in] _windowDimensions width and height of the initial window, used for correct UI scaling

int UISlider::calculateOutput (  ) 

method used to calculate the output of the slider, based on the ouput min, max and slider bar position

Definition at line 117 of file UISlider.cpp.

References m_output, m_outputMax, m_outputMin, m_sliderBarPos, m_sliderDimensions, and m_sliderPos.

00118 {
00119   double sliderParam = (m_sliderBarPos.m_x - (m_sliderPos.m_x - m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2)) / ((m_sliderPos.m_x + m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2) - (m_sliderPos.m_x - m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2));
00120   double outputDivisions = 1.0 / ((m_outputMax - m_outputMin) + 1);
00121   int outputSection = (sliderParam / outputDivisions);
00122   m_output = m_outputMin + outputSection;
00123   return m_output;
00124 }

bool UISlider::isClicked ( int  _x,
int  _y 
)

a method to detect if a button has been clicked, based on it's NDC screen position and dimensions

Parameters:
[in] _x the input x pixel position of the mouse click
[in] _y the input y pixel position of the mouse click

Definition at line 89 of file UISlider.cpp.

References m_sliderDimensions, m_sliderPos, and m_windowDimensions.

00090 {
00091   ngl::Vec2 ndc;
00092   ndc.m_x = ((2.f * _x) / m_windowDimensions.m_x) - 1.f;
00093   ndc.m_y = 1.f - ((2.f * _y) / m_windowDimensions.m_y);
00094   if (ndc.m_x >= (m_sliderPos.m_x - m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2) && ndc.m_x <= (m_sliderPos.m_x + m_sliderDimensions.m_x/2) &&
00095       ndc.m_y >= (m_sliderPos.m_y - m_sliderDimensions.m_y/2) && ndc.m_y <= (m_sliderPos.m_y + m_sliderDimensions.m_y/2))
00096   {
00097     return true;
00098   }
00099   else
00100   {
00101     return false;
00102   }
00103 }

void UISlider::updateText ( std::string  _text,
ngl::Vec3  _colour,
ngl::Vec2  _offset 
)

method used to update the text string, colour and offset from the button centre

Parameters:
[in] _text input std::string to set as the new text string to display
[in] _colour input colour to set as the new text colour
[in] _offset input pixel offset to set as the new text offset from the button centre
